description.value:
Made by Moto Moto

Requires:

  • Active Token Effects

  • Gambit's Premades

  • Vision 5e

effects.name: [Very Tired]
effects.description: You get very tired. If you do not go to sleep immediately, you suffer 1 level of exhaustion.

effects.name: [Light-Headed]
effects.description: You feel lightheaded, gaining disadvantage on all Dexterity checks and saving throws.

effects.name: [Truesight]
effects.description: You gain truesight out to 100 feet.

effects.name: [Invigorated]
effects.description: You feel invigorated, gaining +1 on all Strength checks and saving throws.

effects.name: [Paranoid]
effects.description: You believe everyone is a spy for Strahd, even your fellow party members. You have disadvantage on all insight checks for 24 hours.

effects.name: [Speak with Animals]
effects.description: Your voice has changed; you can only speak plainly for 6 seconds, then must wait 60 seconds to speak plainly again. During the 60 seconds you speak natively like an animal nearby, they can understand everything you say and you understand them. This does not affect spellcasting. You have advantage on all animal handling skill checks.

effects.name: [Pie]
effects.description: You want to eat pie. You will seek out pie for the next 24 hours and consume as much as you can. For every hour that goes by without eating a pie like pastry, you take [[/r 2d6]] psychic damage.

effects.name: [Love]
effects.description: You randomly fall under the charm of one of your fellow party members, willing to do anything they wish.

effects.name: [Huh?]
effects.description: You can only understand language that is spoken to you if its yelled to you. You also fail all insight checks.

effects.name: [Uncanny Hearing]
effects.description: You gain uncanny hearing. You gain advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) checks involving hearing.

effects.name: [Swamp Fey]
effects.description: You see in your mind’s eye the location of the Swamp Fey shrine and know of its location. You gain a swim speed of 60 feet.

effects.name: [Death Sniffer]
effects.description: You can smell death; you know the exact location and type of creature that has died within 100 feet of you and within the past 10 days.

effects.name: [Channeled Magic]
effects.description: You feel magic channeling through every part of your body. Your spells do an additional 1d4 damage or heal an additional 1d4 hit points.

effects.name: [Unseen Servant]
effects.description: An unseen servant materializes and follows your commands.

effects.name: [Vicious Words]
effects.description: When you speak someone’s name and they are within 30 feet of you, you cast vicious mockery on them. This is still a spell that costs 1 action, but only has a verbal component. It uses the highest of Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma on the imbiber. It scales like the cantrip does.

effects.name: [Smol]
effects.description: You shrink to 1 foot tall and retain all your stats.

effects.name: [Tall]
effects.description: You grow to 10 feet tall and retain all your stats.

effects.name: [Dhampyr]
effects.description: You become a dhampyr for 24 hours. You gain fangs and a new unarmed strike that you can only use on incapacitated, restrained, or grappled targets.

effects.name: [Whispers]
effects.description: You hear judgmental whispering all the time. Sometimes these whispers reveal truths in your surroundings you wouldn't otherwise percieve or insight.

effects.name: [Mistwalker]
effects.description: You can walk through the mist without it harming you, but you are unable to escape Barovia. You also become immune to the charmed condition for its duration. You are also immune to psychic damage and resistant to necrotic damage for the duration.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
